name: AVMetadataGroup
desc: A collection of metadata items associated with a timeline segment.

items.name: var items: [AVMetadataItem]
items.desc: The array of metadata items associated with the metadata group.

items.name: var uniqueID: String?
items.desc: The unique identifier for the metadata group.

items.name: var classifyingLabel: String?
items.desc: The classifying label associated with the metadata group.
